AadhaarVerification.title: AadhaarVerification
AadhaarVerification.description: Represents a single Aadhaar verification attempt.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Aadhaar verification attempt.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the verification.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the verification was performed.

status.description: The status of the verification attempt (e.g., 'verified', 'failed', 'error').

imageDataUri.description: The data URI of the uploaded Aadhaar card image.

indicators.description: A summary of fraud indicators found, or null if none.

aadhaarNumber.description: The Aadhaar number extracted from the document.

name.description: The name extracted from the Aadhaar document.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth extracted from the Aadhaar document.

gender.description: The gender extracted from the Aadhaar document.

address.description: The address extracted from the Aadhaar document.

firestore.description: Stores Aadhaar verification attempts for a specific user.
